pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayes Estimation of Latent Class Mixed Multinomial Probit Models // Fitting latent class mixed multinomial probit (LCMMNP) models to simulated or empirical data. Estimation takes place in a Bayesian framework using a Gibbs sampler. The number of latent classes can be updated within the algorithm on a weight- based strategy. For a reference, see Oelschl\u00e4ger and Bauer (2021) https://trid.trb.org/view/1759753.
